document.full_text: italian teen-ager matteo manassero gave himself a perfect early birthday present, lifting the malaysian open title sunday after world number nine rory mcilroy suffered another late collapse.
document.title: manassero pounces on latest mcilroy flop
lines_and_colors: italian teen-ager matteo manassero gave himself a perfect early birthday present, lifting the malaysian open title sunday after world number nine rory mcilroy suffered another late collapse.
